channel.title: Want To Help A NOOB!?!
channel.description:
Hi, I run an online gaming community, we currently have half-life2 & tibia servers, but we just expanded the ram on our box and wanting to upgrade to a nice Prive-RS Server, so with that said, im rather new to this.. i spent most of yesterday looking for a good "private" build.. that has most of the functions that the real RuneScape has (castle wars/banks/trade/Pest control/ ect ect.. the full game) this seems to be the best?
A.) does anyone know of one with more then this has to offer? im noticing a few people posting about some bugs. B.) can anyone explain to me how to get the client to work? in my java-editor i went into client.java and changed the IP to our host IP, but then i hit the compile icon (in the folder).. and am i missing something? no client.. im sure its just because im new... im missing something here?
The Server Im Looking At: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,357580.0.html
if anyone wants to post a better working server that i didnt see, be my guest.. or if someone can atleast explain the client compiler.
thanks, The J Man

item.title: Want To Help A NOOB!?!
item.dc:creator: @TheJMan TheJMan
item.description:
@TheJMan wrote:

Hi, I run an online gaming community, we currently have half-life2 & tibia servers, but we just expanded the ram on our box and wanting to upgrade to a nice Prive-RS Server, so with that said, im rather new to this… i spent most of yesterday looking for a good “private” build… that has most of the functions that the real RuneScape has (castle wars/banks/trade/Pest control/ ect ect… the full game) this seems to be the best?

B.) can anyone explain to me how to get the client to work? in my java-editor i went into client.java and changed the IP to our host IP, but then i hit the compile icon (in the folder)… and am i missing something? no client… im sure its just because im new… im missing something here?

The Server Im Looking At:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

if anyone wants to post a better working server that i didnt see, be my guest… or if someone can atleast explain the client compiler.

thanks,
The J Man
